Other ResourcesÂ¶

Below is a list of existing software resources for processing sonar data. When appropriate we note whether the software is proprietary or open-source, and in which language it is written.

  • EchoView: GUI-based proprietary software, current go-to tool for echosounder data analysis
    • EchoView R: interfacing R and EchoView
  • Echogram: an R package for reading data in the HAC format
  • ESP3: a Matlab toolbox
  • LSSS (Large Scale Survey System)
  • MATECHO: requires MATLAB and Movies3D
    • Movies3D: reads and writes HAC files and is capable of joining EK60 and ME70 data
  • PyEchoLab: a Python package based solely on the NumPy library
  • Sonar4 and Sonar5-Pro

echopype
